plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is science fiction/fantasy, their favourite plot is action/adventure, their favourite musical score is epic/orchestral, their favourite mood for the musical score is intense/epic, their favourite setting is a fictional universe, their favourite visual style is animated/cel-shaded, their favourite writing style is dialogue-driven, their favourite runtime is around 2 hours, and their favourite themes are morality/justice.
